EmailTemplate.name: Post Event.Josh/Phil Talk
EmailTemplate.subject: OSCON 2014 Java Talk: Thank you for joining us for the Spring and Java talk
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {Recipient Name}, Thanks for joining Josh & Phil for the Spring and Java talk during OSCON 2014 <http://www.oscon.com/oscon2014/public/schedule/detail/33875>.
Want to see more of Josh & Phil? Here are two great opportunities!
- Check out their talk on Building 'Bootiful' Applications with Spring Boot <http://bit.ly/POSHyt0004> - Talk to them online at our Spring ask me Anything! <http://www.meetup.com/spring-ask-me-anything-hour/events/194179322/> In fact, thereâ€™s one tomorrow! (July 31, 2014)
Spring Ask Me Anything with Josh Long and Special Guest Security Expert Rob Winch <http://www.meetup.com/spring-ask-me-anything-hour/events/194179322/>
We look forward to seeing you in person or online soon!
